FEDERATION ARE IMPOSED 2200-0400UTC ON NIGHT-TIME DEPATURES FROM
AIRPORTS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION TO AIRPORTS OF THE STATE OF

DESTINED TO THE STATE OF ISRAEL SHOULD BE BASED ON RISK ASSESSMENT,
MADE WITH PROVISIONS OF THE RISK ASSESSMENT MANUAL FOR CIVIL
AIRCRAFT OPERATIONS OVER OR NEAR CONFLICT ZONES (ICAO DOC 10084
SECOND EDITION, 2018) TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT.
